content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'synapsedata01_dl4synapsesea01_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [synapsedata01_dl4synapsesea01_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://synapsedata01@dl4synapsesea01.dfs.core.windows.net'
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[extt1] (
	[col1] int,
	[col2] datetime2
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Parquet/dbo.extt1.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [synapsedata01_dl4synapsesea01_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM [dbo].[extt1]
GO


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[extt1_2] (
	[col1] int,
	[col2] datetime2
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Parquet/dbo.extt1.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [synapsedata01_dl4synapsesea01_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat],
	REJECT_VALUE = 500,
	REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION = 'Reject/'
	)
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM [dbo].[extt1_2]

WITH 
raw_data AS (
    SELECT *
    FROM [dbo].[extt1_4] WHERE ivp_dt = 20240704
),
removed_dup AS (
    SELECT C.* 
    FROM (SELECT DISTINCT zkzfustorcd from raw_data) A
    CROSS APPLY (SELECT TOP 1 * 
                FROM raw_data B
                WHERE A.zkzfustorcd  = B.zkzfustorcd
                ORDER by [TIMESTAMP] DESC) C
),
new_data AS (
    SELECT *
        , CAST('2024-07-01 16:04:12' as date) as [ivp_created_date]
        , CAST('2024-07-01 16:04:12' as datetime2) as [ivp_created_timestamp]
        , 'CCBJI' as [ivp_created_co]
        , 'IVP' as [ivp_created_by]
        , 'IF' as [ivp_created_pgm_nm]
        , CAST('2024-07-01 16:04:12' as date) as [ivp_updated_date]
        , CAST('2024-07-01 16:04:12' as datetime2) as [ivp_updated_timestamp]
        , 'CCBJI' as [ivp_updated_co]
        , 'IVP' as [ivp_updated_by]
        , 'IF' as [ivp_updated_pgm_nm]
        , 'U' as [ivp_updated_cl]
    FROM [removed_dup]
),
new_data_set AS (
    SELECT 
       new_data.[zkzfustorcd]
      ,new_data.[zkzfssetkbn]
      ,new_data.[zkzdcbukrs]
      ,new_data.[zkzfdelotxt]

      ,new_data.[zkzproekbn]
      ,new_data.[zkzpainukbn]
      ,new_data.[zkzimcedflg]
      ,new_data.[zkzarkunnr]
      ,new_data.[zkzppkunnr]

      ,new_data.[zkzarmgtkbn]
      ,new_data.[zkzmoparbuk]
      ,new_data.[zkzmopdebuk]
      ,new_data.[zkzmopucbuk]

      ,new_data.[zkzdirprocd]
      ,new_data.[zkzdibarocd]
      ,new_data.[zkzditeamcd]
      ,new_data.[zkzdirerocd]
      ,new_data.[zkzgrpcd]
      ,new_data.[zkzsmgtbuk]
      ,new_data.[zkzsmgtwer]
      ,new_data.[zkzsmgtrocd]
      ,new_data.[zkzmopsakbn]
      ,new_data.[zkzprsprt]
      ,new_data.[zkzcomcakbn]
      ,new_data.[zkzlacadttm]
      ,new_data.[zkzlcocakbn]
      ,new_data.[zkzlfsorkbn]
      ,new_data.[zkzsclrrflg]
      ,new_data.[zkzcmcorkbn]

      ,new_data.[ZKZONLINEFLG] as [zkzonlineflg]
    ,new_data.[zkzonlinest]

(
	LOCATION = 'Parquet/data.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [synapsedata01_dl4synapsesea01_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]

AS
WITH 
raw_data AS (
    SELECT *
    FROM [dbo].[extt1_4] WHERE ivp_dt = 20240704
),
removed_dup AS (
    SELECT C.* 
    FROM (SELECT DISTINCT zkzfustorcd from raw_data) A
    CROSS APPLY (SELECT TOP 1 * 
                FROM raw_data B
                WHERE A.zkzfustorcd  = B.zkzfustorcd
                ORDER by [TIMESTAMP] DESC) C
),
new_data AS (
    SELECT *
        , CAST('2024-07-01 16:04:12' as date) as [ivp_created_date]
        , CAST('2024-07-01 16:04:12' as datetime2) as [ivp_created_timestamp]
        , 'CCBJI' as [ivp_created_co]

        , 'CCBJI' as [ivp_updated_co]
        , 'IVP' as [ivp_updated_by]
        , 'IF' as [ivp_updated_pgm_nm]
        , 'U' as [ivp_updated_cl]
    FROM [removed_dup]
),
new_data_set AS (
    SELECT 
       new_data.[zkzfustorcd]
      ,new_data.[zkzfssetkbn]
      ,new_data.[zkzdcbukrs]
      ,new_data.[zkzfdelotxt]

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://dl4synapsesea01.dfs.core.windows.net/synapsedata01/CSV/testcsv.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]

source:
# Create a sample DataFrame
data = [
    ("Alice", 30, "Engineer"),
    ("Bob", 35, "Manager"),
    ("Charlie", 40, "Director"),
    ("David", 28, "Data Scientist"),
    ("Eva", 11, "Analyst"),
]
columns = ["name", "age", "occupation"]

df = spark.createDataFrame(data, columns)

# Display the DataFrame (optional)
df.show()

# Write DataFrame to Delta format
# Update the path to your own storage location
output_delta_path = "abfss://synapsedata01@dl4synapsesea01.dfs.core.windows.net/FabricSampleData"

df.write.format("delta") \
    .mode("overwrite") \
    .save(output_delta_path)

print(f"Data successfully written to Delta at: {output_delta_path}")
ALTER table altertestdb.table1 add column c2 int
